2668.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ|O mankind!|134|150|188$ضُرِبَ|Is set forth|95|128|12186$مَثَلٌ|an example,|99|132|12187$فَٱسْتَمِعُواْ|so listen|108|141|7114$لَهُۥٓ‌ۚ|to it.|54|87|977$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|86|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|108|20$تَدْعُونَ|you invoke|91|108|5577$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah|143|160|2971$لَن|will never|82|99|524$يَخْلُقُواْ|create|81|98|12188$ذُبَابًا|a fly|61|78|12189$وَلَوِ|even if|65|74|3087$ٱجْتَمَعُواْ|they gathered together|176|185|12190$لَهُۥ‌ۖ|for it.|57|75|977$وَإِن|And if|58|76|213$يَسْلُبْهُمُ|snatched away from them|193|211|12191$ٱلذُّبَابُ|the fly|83|101|12192$شَيْــًٔا|a thing|66|75|472$لَّا|not|42|69|30$يَسْتَنقِذُوهُ|they (could) take it back|186|240|12193$مِنْهُ‌ۚ|from it.|68|122|571$ضَعُفَ|So weak|85|139|12194$ٱلطَّالِبُ|(are) the seeker|128|155|12195$وَٱلْمَطْلُوبُ|and the one who is sought.|202|202|12196$

2671.verse: يَعْلَمُ|He knows|83|94|742$مَا|what|53|76|262$بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ|(is) before them|127|150|2273$وَمَا|and what|82|105|46$خَلْفَهُمْ‌ۗ|(is) after them.|122|145|2274$وَإِلَى|And to|67|90|1836$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|64|606$تُرْجَعُ|return|75|314|1837$ٱلْأُمُورُ|all the matters.|122|361|1838$

2672.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|200|218|7177$ٱرْكَعُواْ|Bow|90|126|12199$وَٱسْجُدُواْ|and prostrate|110|146|12200$وَٱعْبُدُواْ|and worship|99|135|3980$رَبَّكُمْ|your Lord|82|100|6461$وَٱفْعَلُواْ|and do|91|132|12201$ٱلْخَيْرَ|[the] good|91|173|12202$لَعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|211|193$تُفْلِحُونَ ۩|be successful.|119|160|1677$

2668.verse: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.

2669.verse: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

2670.verse: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

2671.verse: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.

2672.verse: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.

2673.verse: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
